name: Dark Tower
description: Dark Tower is a deadly dungeon of death room exploration in which every move counts. Puzzle your way to the very top of the tower by unlocking doors using a limited number of keys. Face dangerous enemies such as goblins, skeletons, mages, vampires, and more! Use keys wisely.
minimum_requirements: OS: Vista/7/8.x/10 Storage: 130 MB available space
